main event: A civilian woman observed an object shaped like a lifesaver with black smoke emitting from the top, traveling in a reciprocal arc of 150 degrees at a speed of 0.13 degrees per second.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 2 hours.
The object was observed by a woman and two young girls.
The object traveled in a 150-degree arc at a speed of 0.13 degrees per second.
The object emitted black smoke from the top.
The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 30,000 feet.
sighted object: object shaped like a lifesaver with black smoke emitting from the top
witnesses: civilian woman, teenage girl, young girl
